markdownRemark.html: A Drop Zone is an area on the screen into a which an object can be dragged and dropped to accomplish a task. For example, a Drop Zone might be used in an upload workflow to enable the user to simply drop a file from their operating system into the Drop Zone, which is a more efficient and intuitive action, rather than utilize the standard “Choose File” dialog.
